    <script type="text/javascript" id="www-widgetapi-script" src="./joyent_storage_files/www-widgetapi.js" async=""></script><script type="text/javascript" async="" src="./joyent_storage_files/linkid.js"></script><script async="" id="demandbase_js_lib" src="./joyent_storage_files/rt9IDBtd.min.js"></script><script type="text/javascript" async="" src="./joyent_storage_files/munchkin.js"></script><script src="./joyent_storage_files/iframe_api"></script><script async="" src="./joyent_storage_files/analytics.js"></script><script type="application/ld+json">
    {  "@context" : "http://schema.org",

       "name" : "Joyent",
       "url" : "https://www.joyent.com"
    }
    </script>

    <title>Joyent | Pricing</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Pricing for Joyent&#39;s Manta object storage service.">

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./joyent_storage_files/style.css">    <script src="./joyent_storage_files/jquery.min.js"></script>    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./joyent_storage_files/footable.core.min.css">    <script src="./joyent_storage_files/bootstrap.min.js"></script>    <script src="./joyent_storage_files/footable.js"></script>    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('pre').each(function() {
                var thepre = $(this);
                if (!thepre.hasClass('ignore')) thepre.addClass('prettyprint');
            });
            $('#toggle-menu').on('touchstart click',menu);
            $('#page').on('touchstart click',function(e) {
                var $bod = $('body');
                if ($bod.hasClass('menu-visible')) {
                    menu(e);
                }
            });
            $('#menu .main-nav li.top.subs > a').on('touchstart click', function() {
                var theClass = $(this).attr('id');
                if($(this).parent().hasClass('dropped')) {
                    $('li.top').removeClass('dropped');
                    $('ul.nav-drop').hide(300);
                } else {
                    $('li.top').removeClass('dropped');
                    $('ul.nav-drop').hide(300);
                    $(this).parent().addClass('dropped');
                    $('ul.nav-drop.' + theClass).show(300);
                }
                return false;
            });
        });
        function menu(e) {
            e.preventDefault();

            var $body = $( 'body' ),
                $page = $( '#page' ),
                $menu = $( '#menu' ),
                transitionEnd = 'transitionend webkitTransitionEnd otransitionend MSTransitionEnd';

            $body.addClass( 'animating' );

            if ( $body.hasClass( 'menu-visible' ) ) {
                $body.addClass( 'right' );
            } else {
                $body.addClass( 'left' );
            }

            $page.on( transitionEnd, function() {
                $body.removeClass( 'animating right left' ).toggleClass( 'menu-visible' );
                $page.off( transitionEnd );
            });
            e.stopPropagation();
        };
    </script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="./joyent_storage_files/prettify.css">    <script src="./joyent_storage_files/xrt3gzo.js"></script>    <style type="text/css">.tk-din-condensed-web{font-family:"din-condensed-web",sans-serif;}.tk-open-sans{font-family:"open-sans",sans-serif;}.tk-source-code-pro{font-family:"source-code-pro",sans-serif;}</style><link rel="stylesheet" href="./joyent_storage_files/l" media="all"><script>try{Typekit.load({ async: true });}catch(e){}</script>

</script>

<div class="container">
    <div class="row top">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12">
            <h1 class="visible-xs">Cloud Pricing</h1>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="container">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 pricing-tabs">
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing" class="">Compute</a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/images" class="">Image</a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/manta" class="active">Manta <span class="hidden-xs">Service</span></a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/bandwidth" class="">Bandwidth</a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/support-tiers" class="">Support</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="container">
    <div class="row chart">
        <div class="col-sm-2 column tabs">
            <ul class="switch manta">
                <li class="storage active"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/manta" class="storage">Storage</a></li>
                <li class="compute"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/manta" class="compute">Compute</a></li>
                <li class="requests"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/manta" class="requests">Requests</a></li>
            </ul>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-10 tab-content">
            <div class="tab-pane active" id="storage">
                <table class="table">
                    <thead>
                        <tr><th>Storage Tier</th><th>Per Individual Copy</th><th>Per 2 Copies (default)</th>
                     </tr></thead>
                     <tbody>
                        <tr><td>First 1 TB/month</td><td>$0.043 per GB</td><td>$0.086 per GB</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>Next 49 TB/month</td><td>$0.036 per GB</td><td>$0.072 per GB</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>Next 450 TB/month</td><td>$0.032 per GB</td><td>$0.064 per GB</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>Next 500 TB/month</td><td>$0.029 per GB</td><td>$0.058 per GB</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>Next 4000 TB/month</td><td>$0.027 per GB</td><td>$0.054 per GB</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>Next 5000 TB/month</td><td>$0.025 per GB</td><td>$0.050 per GB</td></tr>
                        <tr><td colspan="3">Default is 2 copies. When submitting an object to the service, you can specify the number of copies stored, from one (1) to six (6). Storage billing has a per object minimum of 128kb.</td></tr>
                    </tbody>
                </table>
            </div>
            <div class="tab-pane" id="compute">
                <p>With this compute service, you're only paying for the seconds that it takes to do your compute job directly on an object. All compute jobs are made up of one or more tasks. Tasks are the actual computation on an object or the output of another task.</p>
                <p>This service measures tasks in wall-clock time normalized per GB DRAM and is metered in seconds. You never pay for idle time or the time while data is moving (because it never does).</p>
                <p>Price is $0.00004/GB DRAM•sec</p>

                <p>The default instance size provided is 1GB in DRAM and you can select larger instance types that provide up to 32GB of DRAM and 1TB of temporary disk space.</p>

                <p><strong>The rate for each task is calculated as follows:</strong> first, take the DRAM requested when the job was submitted and find the rate in the corresponding tier in the table below. Similarly, take the disk space requested when the job was submitted and find the corresponding tier in the table. The rate for the task is the <em>greater</em> of the rates for these two tiers. For example, if you request 2GB of DRAM and 32GB of disk space, tasks will be charged at the tier 2 rate (because of the DRAM requested). If you request 2GB of DRAM and 128GB of disk space, tasks will be charged at the tier 3 rate (because of the disk space requested).</p>

                <table class="table">
                    <thead>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Pricing Tier</th><th>DRAM (GB)</th><th>Max. Disk Space (GB)</th><th>$ Price/sec</th>
                        </tr>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                        <tr><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>32</td><td>0.00004</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>2</td><td>2</td><td>64</td><td>0.00008</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>3</td><td>4</td><td>128</td><td>0.00016</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>4</td><td>8</td><td>256</td><td>0.00032</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>5</td><td>16</td><td>512</td><td>0.00064</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>6</td><td>32</td><td>1024</td><td>0.00128</td></tr>
                    </tbody>
                </table>

                <p>If you run 1000 parallel tasks on 1000 objects and they each take a second, then you've used 1000 seconds of time and the cost for this job would be $0.04.</p>

                <p>If you run 1000 parallel tasks in 32GB DRAM instances on 1000 objects and they each take a second, then you've used 32000 seconds of time and the cost for this job would be $1.28.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="tab-pane" id="requests">
                <table class="table">
                    <thead>
                        <tr><th>Request Type</th><th>Price per unit of requests</th></tr>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                        <tr><td>Delete</td><td>Free</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>POST, PUT, LIST (“GET DIR”)</td><td>$0.005/1000 requests</td></tr>
                        <tr><td>GET, OPTION, HEAD</td><td>$0.004/10000 requests</td></tr>
                    </tbody>
                </table>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
    <script src="./joyent_storage_files/combined.js"></script>
<footer class="footer" id="footer">
    <div class="container hidden-print">
        <div class="foot-logo row">
            <div class="col-sm-12">
                <p><img src="./joyent_storage_files/foot-logo.svg" class="svg"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-8">
                <p class="tag">Joyent delivers container-native infrastructure, offering organizations high-performance, yet simple public cloud and private cloud software solutions for today’s demanding real-time web and mobile applications.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1">
                <p>Connect with Joyent</p>
                <ul class="social clearfix">

</ul>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="container hidden-xs" id="footer">

                    <li><a href="https://help.joyent.com/home" id="footer-help-desk">Help Desk</a></li>
                    <li><a href="https://status.joyent.com/" id="footer-system-status">System Status</a></li>
                    <li><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/manta#" id="footer-feedback" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#feedback">Site Feedback</a></li>
                    <li><a href="https://www.joyent.com/search" id="footer-search">Site Search</a></li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row copyright">
            <div class="col-sm-6 logorow">
                <p>© 2016 Joyent, Inc. | <a href="https://www.joyent.com/about/policies">Policies</a> | <a href="https://www.joyent.com/about/security-and-compliance">Compliance</a></p>            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                MktoForms2.loadForm("//app-sjf.marketo.com", "993-RJQ-253", 1244, function(form){
                    form.onSuccess(function(values, followUpUrl){
                      //get the form's jQuery element and hide it
                      form.getFormElem().hide();
                      //return false to prevent the submission handler from taking the lead to the follow up url.
                      $('.thankyou').show();
                      return false;
                    });
                  });

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
    $('.switch li a').click(function() {
        var theclass = $(this).attr('class');
        $('.switch li').removeClass('active');
        $('.switch li.' + theclass).addClass('active');
        $('.tab-pane').removeClass('active');
        $('.tab-pane#' + theclass).addClass('active');
        return false;
    });
});
</script>
